data.title: About
data.text:
Maison Arts is a boutique record label & music publishing company based in Los Angeles whose focus is to bring a modern approach to the music business.

â

We are dynamic team of seasoned experts with strong backgrounds in management, publishing, marketing, record label management, live and touring. Our team is committed to providing comprehensive support from A&R feedback to sample clearance, distribution, synch pitching, DSP pitching, marketing rollout plans + execution, social strategy and beyond. Our team prides itself on bigger picture thinking and execution.

â

Maison Arts was founded by music executives Simon Kessler, John Scholz, and Tyler Goldberg, three music veterans who came together to build a home for creators and lend their unique experience to help develop careers. Scholz, Goldberg and Kessler are joined by Head of A&R Livia Piomelli, Head of Marketing Maya Michaelian, Head of Digital Julie Nguyen, and A&R Arielle Tindel. On the publishing side, the company has recently signed an administration deal with Kobalt Music Group. On the label side, the company has recently signed a distribution deal with The Orchard.
